titles.title: A bill to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to remove the 7-percent interest rate limitation on certain Rural Electrification Administration loans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4898)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Star Print ordered on the bill.

bill.summary: 4/26/1994--Introduced. Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to remove the seven percent maximum interest rate on Rural Electrification Administration insured electric and telephone loans and Federal Financing Bank loan refinancings.
